sentences.sentence: This is where money is made and there's little time for la dolce vita.
sentences.translation: 这里是赚钱之地，可没有时间去奢侈享乐。

sentences.sentence: Messrs. Dolce and Gabbana decided to buy the D&G license back six years ago to improve its positioning.
sentences.translation: 早在六年前，杜嘉班纳就决定收购 D&G ，以巩固其时尚界的地位。

sentences.sentence: The Italians have an old saying, "Il dolce far niente."
sentences.translation: 意大利人有句老话：“Il dolce far niente .”。
